name: Asteroid Force
description:
Asteroid Force is a fun and fast paced arcade style shooter. You are a pilot of a ship with one mission, protect Earth from incoming asteroids. Asteroids are not the only thing you need to worry about, certain levels also include aliens. Defeating asteroids and aliens earns you medallions that can be used to purchase upgrades. Good luck out there!

Protect the Earth:
- Shields available
- Health pickups

Upgrade your ship:
- Improved weapons
- Improve ship thrust
- Increase shield count

How many waves can you complete?
